desc: Part of the highly successful Shelly Cashman series, this text provides an introduction to HTML and leads the user through a clear, step-by-step, screen-by-screen approach to learning. Readers learn how to create a Web page using HTML, format the page, add graphics, and more.
title: HTML, XHTML, and CSS: Introductory (Available Titles Skills Assessment Manager (SAM) â€“ Office 2007)
